item.title: DC’s Next Big Publishing Event Revealed as Superhero Slugfest ‘DC K.O’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Scott Snyder and Joshua Williamson are co-architecting the publishing initiative that will launch this fall.

item.title: Superman is a box office hit, but the hard part comes next
item.description: Over the weekend, DC Studios’ new Superman feature became this year’s third-biggest box-office debut in the US. The movie’s success is a sign that theatergoers might actually not be quite as tired of
